data.title: Bitcoin ATM Firm Puts Bitcoin On 10% Discount For Black Friday: Arbitrage of the Year?
data.description: Athena Bitcoin, the US-based fintech company operating Bitcoin ATM across the country, has rolled out a special Black Friday deal. Users can get a 10% discount on their Bitcoin purchases made on 28 November 2025. The deal only applies if the users buy Bitcoins through any of its Bitcoin ATM ...
data.keywords: Bitcoin ATM, Bitcoin Depot, Athena Bitcoin, Cash Cloud
